# [Interview #204: DragonCon Report - Matt Hatch, Entry #37](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=204#37)

#### Question

Can a person who cannot channel the One Power, can they use the True Power of the Dark One?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
